src:
Liza hibang sa Korean pop stars
03 Nov 2019, 09:46 by Aster Amoyo
MARAMING Filipino fans ng mga K-Pop groups and personalities ang willing gumastos nang malaki makita lamang ang kanilang mga ini-idolo.  Bukod sa Megastar na si Sharon Cuneta, ang actress-TV host na si Anne Curtis at marami pang iba, hindi rin lingid sa marami na isa ring K-Pop fangirl ang ka-loveteam at kasintahan ni Enrique Gil na si Liza Soberano.
Bukod sa libu-libong  Korean fans sa Seoul, Korea, maraming Filipino fans ang dumayo ng Seoul para lamang mapanood ang sikat na K-Pop group, ang BTS na ginanap sa Seoul Olympic Stadium ng Seoul, Korea nung nakaraang October 27 billed as “BTS World Tour – Love Yourself” at isa sa kanila si Liza.  
Ayon mismo kay Liza, tiniis niya ang gutom, lamig at  mahabang oras sa pila para lamang mapanood at matunghayan ang kanyang mga ini-idolo.  At habang naghihintay na makapasok sa loob ng stadium, doon lamang na-realize at na-appreciate nang husto  ng Kapamilya star ang nararanasan ng kanyang fans para lamang mapalapit sa kanya.
Tulad ni Erwan Heussaff sa kanyang misis na si Anne Curtis, suportado rin ni Enrique ang pagkahibang ni Liza sa BTS at sa iba pang K-Pop celebrities.
Samantala, may bagong teleseryeng aabangan ang mga fans nina Liza at Enrique, ang “Make It with You” na pinamamahalaan ni Cathy Garcia-Molina na ang ibang eksena ay kinunan pa sa Croatia.  Ito ang kanilang follow-up TV series sa kanilang”Bagani” nung isang taon.
text:
Liza is crazy about Korean pop stars
03 Nov 2019, 09:46 by Aster Amoyo
MANY Filipino fans of K-Pop groups and personalities are willing to spend a lot of money just to see their idols. Aside from Megastar's Sharon Cuneta, actress-TV host Anne Curtis and many others, Enrique Gil's girlfriend and girlfriend Liza Soberano is also unknown to many K-Pop fangirls.
In addition to thousands of Korean fans in Seoul, Korea, many Filipino fans came to Seoul just to watch the famous K-Pop group, the BTS held at the Seoul Olympic Stadium in Seoul, Korea last October 27 billed as “BTS World Tour - Love Yourself ”and Liza is one of them.
According to Liza, she endured hunger, cold and long hours in the queue just to watch and see her idols. And while waiting to get inside the stadium, the Kapamilya star only realized and appreciated her fans' experience just to be near her.
Like Erwan Heussaff to his wife Anne Curtis, Enrique also supported Liza's manhood at BTS and other K-Pop celebrities.
Meanwhile, Liza and Enrique's fans have a new telescope in the making, "Make It with You" directed by Cathy Garcia-Molina that other scenes have been shot in Croatia. This is their follow-up TV series in their "Bagani" one year.
